author: jorton
msg: Review of x86 asm, fixing intel_atomic_add32 with gcc 2.7.2.1 which
doesn't allow the '+' constraint on an output operand.
(intel_atomic_add32): Use separate input operands rather than
(apr_atomic_dec32): Simplify by two instructions to output an 8-bit

author: bnicholes
msg: Clean up some 32 bit/64 bit type incompatibilities that cause problems when large file support is enabled.  Also turn large file support back on for NetWare

author: trawick
msg: enable i386 atomics for gcc on any platform...
it is expected that there are relatively few
(or zero) platforms where it would be used

author: bnicholes
msg: large file support is causing problems with acrobat reader and PDF files.  Turning it off on NetWare until I can figure out why.

author: trawick
msg: enable the x86 atomic code on Solaris/x86
